cause.description:
The Stateside Dispatch is the twice weekly email newsletter of the Progressive States Network, it provides an excellent analysis of the status of progressive issues and legislation from around the country. The goal of this cause is to get Facebook users to read and distribute this valuable resource. Sign-up for the Stateside Dispatch here: http://progressivestates.org/signup/index.html
1. Empowering decision-makers with everything they need to engineer forward-thinking change.
2. Rewarding work
3. Helping families
4. Growing the economy
5. Strengthening communities
6. Increasing democracy
cause.mission: Increase readership of the Stateside Dispatch.
cause.name: Progressive States Network
